titleStmt.title: Tirunaḷḷāṟu, Tarppāraṇyēcuvarar, time of Caṭaiyavarman Sundara Pāṇḍya, year 13 + 1

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p:
kōṟ-caṭaai-paṉmar tiri-puvaṉa-c-cakkara-varttikaḷ śrī-cuntara-pāṇṭiya-tēvarkku y[ā]ṇṭu 10 3-vatu
Etir-ām āṇṭu meṣa-nāyaṟṟu puūrvva-pakṣattu caturddaśiyum tiṅka-ṭ-kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa cōti-nāḷ

Uyya-k-ko
ṇṭār-vaḷa-nāṭṭu muḻaiyyūr-nāṭṭu Uṭaiyār tiru-naḷḷāṟ-uṭaiyār kōyil Āti-caṇṭēśvara-tēvakaṉmika
ḷōm viruta-rāca-payaṅkara-vaḷa-nāṭṭu kuṟukkai-nāṭṭu vaṉṉiyūril vaṉṉiyūr kiḻavaṉ Aṇai
-c-cakai Aḻakiyār makaṉ cuntara-p-perumāṉukku tāṉa-niyōkam kuṭutta paric’ āvatu

Uṭaiyār tiru-naḷ
ḷāṟ-uṭaiya nāyaṉārkku perumāḷ tiru-nāmattālē kō-taṇṭa-rāmaṉ cantiyum puraṭṭāci tiru-nāḷum
kaṭṭuvittu Amutu-paṭi cāttu-p paṭi Uḷḷiṭṭa nicata-nimantaṅkaḷukkum tiru-nāḷ celavukkum pala tiru-p-paṇi
kaḷukkum nāṟ-patiṟṟu vēli nilamum Uḷḷuūr Āyavaṟkammum Iṟai-y-ili-y-āka Iṭuvittu Ittāl varum U
pātikaḷum tēvaikaḷum Iṟaikaḷum māḷikai nimantamum maṟṟum Uḷḷiṭṭa Upātikaḷum kaḻip=pittu tiru-muka
mum Eḻutuvittu-k koṇṭu varukayil Ip=-pa=ṭi ceytu vanta Ivarkku Iṉ-ṉāyaṉār kōyil māṭāpattiyamum ⌈
teṟkil tiru-vītiyil teṉ-ciṟakil tiru-v-uṇāḻikaiyār maṭattukku kiḻakku śrī-mukkōl taṟai maṉaiyum kāṇi-y-āka-k ku
ṭuttōm

nāḷ Oṉṟukku tūṇi Āka vanta nellu nimantam-āka-p peṟavum Ip-paṭi cantirātitta-varaiyum kāṇi-y-
āka koṇṭu viṟṟum Oṟṟi vaittum koḷḷa-k kaṭavar ākavum

Ip=-pa=ṭi cammatittu tāṉa-niyōkam paṇṇi
kuṭuttōm vaṉṉiyuūr kiḻavar cuntarpa-perumāṉukku Uṭaiyār tiru-naḷḷāṟ-uṭaiyār kōyil Āti-caṇṭēśvara-tēvakaṉmika
ḷōm
Ip-paṭikku kāśyapaṉ toṇṭaṉ kulōttuṅka-cōḻa-paṭ=ṭaṉ Eḻuttu Eṉṟum
...
...
Ivai kōyil-kaṇakku vaikāvuūr-uṭaiyāṉ tiru-c-cirā-p-paḷḷi Uṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu
Edited in (PI 485); re-edited in (Tirunaḷḷāṟu 40), with photos. Translated in (PI 485).
This edition by G. Vijayavenugopal (2019). Curated by Emmanuel Francis (2024), based on photos (N. Ramaswamy, 2016).
